description: Source file defining Express.js routes for a notes API, handling CRUD operations with database interactions.

methods.name: GET /api/notes
methods.description: Retrieves a list of notes with optional search and sorting.

methods.name: POST /api/notes
methods.description: Creates a new note with title and optional content.

methods.name: GET /api/notes/:id
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note by its ID.

methods.name: PUT /api/notes/:id
methods.description: Updates an existing note's title and/or content by ID.
